title: CHILI CHICKEN ENCLILADAS
directions: 1. Shred the chicken breast and saut√© with onion in olive oil over medium heat till onions are tender.
2. Add in green chilis, soup and milk or cream. Stir to combine very well.
3. Remove from heat and spoon about 1/2 cup of mixture into each tortilla and top with some cheese.
4. Roll up and place in a greased casserole dish. Continue until all mixture is gone.
5. Spoon enchilada sauce over the top and cover well with cheese.
6. Bake in a preheated 350 degree oven for 20-25 minutes or until cheese is bubbly.
ingredients: 5 boneless chicken breast, boiled till cooked through
1/4 Cup heavy cream or whole milk
1 pkg. finely shredded Colby jack cheese
10 flour tortillas (I use the soft taco size)
